extent.charseq: Kerry won decisively not only in Ohio and Florida but also in a number of other States

ldc_scope.charseq: According to this person Kerry won decisively not only in Ohio and Florida but also in a number of other States and in the overall popular vote
Tony Troughton-Smith for posting this article on the StopMAI WA newsgroup
Kerry Won the Election by at least 1,7 Million Votes
The truth about this election is this: Florida and Ohio had to go for Bush in order for him to "win" the election
The truth about this election is this: Florida and Ohio had to go for Bush in order for him to "win" the election
Kerry was the clear winner, but victory was snatched from him
But Kerry actually won by about 750,000 votes
And even where Bush legitimately won, he was still awarded additional votes
